definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The finding suggested that enterohepatic circulation of gastrodin did not exist in rats.
sentences.chinese: 结论天麻素在大鼠体内不存在肠肝循环。

sentences.english: The possible mechanism of gastrodin formation during the crude process was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文还讨论了天麻素在炮制过程中形成的可能机理。

sentences.english: ConclusionTMZX granules obviously possesses the diuretic and antemetic effects.
sentences.chinese: 结论天麻止眩颗粒具有一定的利尿及镇吐作用。

sentences.english: Following the development of the corm, starch was accumulated progressively.
sentences.chinese: 随着天麻球茎的生长发育，逐渐积累淀粉。

sentences.english: Aim To optimize the preparation of rhizoma gastrodiae dispersible tablet.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察处方中组分对天麻分散片制剂的影响。

sentences.english: The possible mechanism of gastrodin formation during the cru…
sentences.chinese: 本文还讨论了天麻素在炮制过程中形成的可能机理。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical effectiveness and safety of gastrodin injection in the treatment of vertigo.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价天麻素注射液治疗眩晕的疗效及安全性。

sentences.english: The properties of each G. elata and the contents of gastrodin in each G. elata are also analysed.
sentences.chinese: 并对各大麻的性状及天麻甙的含量进行了分析。

sentences.english: Objective To found a quick separation method of Gastrodia elata genome DNA.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立天麻基因组DNA快速提取方法。

sentences.english: The earliest development of the amyloplasts of Gastrodia elata Bl. occur-red round the nucleus of young cells was observed.
sentences.chinese: 天麻的造粉体最早发生在幼龄细胞内核的附近。

sentences.english: Gastrodia elate Blume medicinal wine has extensive applied prospect.
sentences.chinese: 天麻药酒具有显著的抗血凝作用。

sentences.english: Conclutions The pharmacokinetics of gastrodin injection in volunteers was accorded with two compartment model.
sentences.chinese: 结论天麻素注射液的人体药动学符合药动学二室模型。

sentences.english: Modern research has shown, for orchids gastrodia tuber parasitic plant dry for many years.
sentences.chinese: 现代研究表明，天麻为兰科多年寄生植物的干燥块茎。

sentences.english: Scientific basis was provided for the further development of the resources of Gastrodia elata Bl. f. glsuca S. Chow.
sentences.chinese: 该研究为乌天麻资源的开发利用提供了科学依据。

sentences.english: This kind of soil is good for growing watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 这种土壤宜于种植天麻。

sentences.english: In the present review, English literature on the pharmacological effects of Gastrodia elata was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 综述了关于天麻药理研究的英文文献。
